header_text: You are sitting in an online meeting and space out for a minute. Your boss asks you a question, and you don't hear it. You ask her to repeat her question, and this makes you feel ok.

elements.Text: Are you comfortable asking your department head to repeat her question?

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
